item.title: 美国高等级公司债券销售重启，市场趋于稳定
item.description: 美国高等级公司债券市场周二重新开市，自唐纳德-特朗普总统宣布加征关税导致信用风险飙升并助长了自2022年以来最大的单日损失以来，市场出现了第一笔交易。【原文：The US high-grade corporate bond market reopened Tuesday, with the first deal coming forward since President Donald Trump’s tariff announcement sent perceived credit risk surging and helped fuel the biggest one-day loss since 2022.】

item.title: 创纪录大跌后台湾将动用市场稳定基金
item.description: 在与美国的贸易战导致股市下挫加剧后，台湾政府允许其国家金融稳定基金介入支持岛内股市。【原文：The Taiwanese government allowed its National Financial Stabilization Fund to step in to support the island’s stock market after the selloff deepened amid a trade war with the US.】

item.title: 中央银行发出警告后智利年度通胀加速
item.description: 智利央行行长罗珊娜-科斯塔（Rosanna Costa）警告经济存在前所未有的不确定性一天后公布的一份报告显示，智利上个月的年通货膨胀率进一步加速，超过了目标值。【原文：Chile’s annual inflation accelerated further above target last month according to a report published one day after central bank Governor Rosanna Costa warned of unprecedented economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 乌克兰最大的钢铁制造商从美国接收首批煤炭货物
item.description: 乌克兰最大的钢铁制造商 Metinvest BV 从其美国子公司收到了第一批进口焦煤，此前俄罗斯的攻势迫使该公司关闭了当地的一个煤矿。【原文：Ukraine’s biggest steelmaker, Metinvest BV, received the first batch of imported coking coal from its US subsidiary after Russian offensives forced it to shut a local mine.】

item.title: 英国如何放宽电动汽车授权以帮助濒临破产的汽车制造商
item.description: 在汽车行业抱怨销售配额与消费者需求脱节之后，英国政府放宽了电动汽车的目标。【原文：The UK government has relaxed its targets for electric vehicles after a chorus of complaints from the automotive industry that the sales quotas are out of sync with consumer appetite.】

item.title: 市场认为美国和欧洲通胀出现四年来最大分歧
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战在美国和欧元区的短期通胀预期之间制造了自大流行病以来最大的楔子。【原文：President Donald Trump’s trade war has driven the biggest wedge between short-term inflation expectations for the US and euro area since the pandemic.】

item.title: 穆迪称私募股权投资支持的公司面临现金困境
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）称，在特朗普政府全面征收关税后，私募股权支持的公司将很难找到更多现金。【原文：Private equity backed firms will struggle to find additional cash in the wake of the Trump administration’s sweeping tariffs, according to Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 英国石油公司终止在西班牙工厂生产清洁喷气燃料的计划
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，英国石油公司（BP Plc）正在暂停在西班牙卡斯特隆炼油厂扩大生物燃料生产的项目。【原文：BP Plc is pausing a project to expand biofuels production at its Castellon oil refinery in Spain, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞波公司将以 12.5 亿美元收购 Prime-Brokerage Hidden Road 公司
item.description: 瑞波公司将以 12.5 亿美元的价格收购主要经纪公司 Hidden Road，这是数字资产公司有史以来最大的一笔交易，也是加密货币行业历史上最大的交易之一。【原文：Ripple is acquiring prime-brokerage Hidden Road for $1.25 billion, marking the largest deal ever for the digital-asset company and one of the biggest in the history of the cryptocurrency industry.】

item.title: 贝森特称日本、韩国和台湾可能支持阿拉斯加能源协议
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收高额互惠关税后的贸易谈判大背景下，阿拉斯加可能达成一项涉及亚洲主要经济合作伙伴的能源投资协议。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Tuesday flagged a potential energy investment deal in Alaska involving key Asian economic partners, in the broader context of trade talks in the wake of President Donald Trump’s steep reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 大跌后买盘涌现，美国股指期货上涨
item.description: 由于担心唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战可能引发经济衰退，美国股票期货上涨，在现货交易时段出现波动后反弹。【原文：US equity futures rose, rebounding after volatility in the cash session amid concerns that President Donald Trump’s trade war could spur an economic recession.】

item.title: 里夫斯称英国市场在美国关税打击后有效运作
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）表示，针对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税影响，金融市场正在按照预期运行，英国正在考虑采取一系列不同的应对措施来保护本国企业。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves said financial markets are working as intended in response to the impact of US President Donald Trump’s tariffs and that the UK is considering a range of different responses to protect its own firms.】

item.title: 关税冲击市场，英国央行要求银行警惕流动性风险
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税导致市场崩溃之后，英格兰银行已通知商业贷款机构密切关注流动性问题，并披露任何潜在的资金问题。【原文：The Bank of England has told commercial lenders to keep an eye on liquidity issues and disclose any potential funding problems following the market rout caused by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 微软耗资巨大的数据中心扩建遇阻
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，我们的每日时事通讯提供彭博社全球记者对科技商业的报道和分析。今天，布罗迪-福特（Brody Ford）报道了可能会减缓昂贵的数据中心扩张计划的因素，这些计划旨在满足微软等公司对云和人工智能的需求。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Brody Ford reports on the factors that may slow expensive data center expansion plans aimed at meeting cloud and AI demand from the likes of Microsoft.】

item.title: 日本在美国关税谈判中名列前茅
item.description: 早在上世纪 80 年代，商人唐纳德-特朗普就是一名贸易保护主义者，当时日本是国内制造商的最大威胁。四十年后的今天，特朗普总统在贸易战中对日本表现出了一定的礼貌，因为中国已成为其最大的竞争对手。【原文：Donald Trump the businessman came of age as a protectionist back in the 1980s, when Japan was the biggest threat to domestic manufacturers. Four decades later, Trump the president is showing Japan some courtesy in his trade wars now that China is the top competitor.】

item.title: 第六街联合创始人领导重振旧金山的努力
item.description: 私募股权公司 Sixth Street 的联合创始人正与一位加密货币企业家和惠普公司前首席执行官联手振兴旧金山陷入困境的市中心，并为该市新任市长提供支持。【原文：A co-founder of private equity firm Sixth Street is joining forces with a crypto entrepreneur and a former Hewlett-Packard chief executive to revitalize San Francisco’s struggling downtown and bolster the city’s new mayor.】

item.title: 泰国称美国加征关税是其改革进口政策的契机
item.description: 泰国计划改革其进口关税结构和非贸易壁垒，同时准备与特朗普政府进行谈判，以减轻美国对其出口征收 36% 关税的影响。【原文：Thailand plans to revamp its import duty structure and non-trade barriers as it prepares for talks with the Trump administration to lessen the impact of a 36% tariff on its exports to the US.】

item.title: 英国水务局给予英国监督机构更多时间审查水务开支计划
item.description: 英国竞争与市场管理局将获得额外六个月的时间来重新确定五家自来水公司的价格审查，从而推迟决定允许这些公司向客户收取多少费用以及向投资者返还多少回报。【原文：The UK’s Competition and Markets Authority will get an additional six months to redetermine price reviews for five water companies, delaying a decision on how much they’ll be allowed to charge customers and return to investors.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦国家航空公司二十年来首次实现盈利
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的文件，巴基斯坦国家航空公司 PIA Holding Co.【原文：PIA Holding Co., the national airline of Pakistan, is set to report its first annual profit in more than two decades ahead of plans to sell the national carrier, according to documents seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 苹果历史性大跌令多头对关税风险望而却步
item.description: 苹果公司股价的大幅下挫表明，投资者对该公司是否有能力应对唐纳德-特朗普总统对中国、越南和印度征收的关税持怀疑态度。【原文：A sharp selloff in shares of Apple Inc. illustrates investor skepticism about its ability to navigate President Donald Trump’s tariffs on China, Vietnam and India — countries all critical to the iPhone maker’s supply chain.】

item.title: 交易员押注 "疯狂 "货币波动将持续下去
item.description: 随着贸易战的升级动摇了全球经济秩序，货币交易员们正将货币市场的动荡定位为更加严重。【原文：Currency traders are positioning for turbulence in currency markets to get even worse as an escalating trade war shakes up the global economic order.】

item.title: 丹麦 Arla 和德国 DMK 将打造欧洲乳业巨头
item.description: 丹麦的 Arla Foods 和德国的 DMK 集团计划合并为一家合作社，将 12,000 多名农民联合起来，打造欧洲乳业巨头。【原文：Denmark’s Arla Foods and Germany’s DMK Group plan to merge into one cooperative, bringing together more than 12,000 farmers to create a European dairy giant.】

item.title: 德国电价将居高不下，与天然气的联系将更加紧密
item.description: 由于未来几年与天然气的联系将得到加强，德国的电价将继续走高。【原文：Electricity prices in Germany will remain elevated as their link to natural gas is poised to strengthen over the coming years.】

item.title: 世界银行将为肯尼亚提供 7.5 亿美元资金与改革目标挂钩
item.description: 世界银行表示，将为肯尼亚释放更多融资，条件是东非经济体实施去年达成的广泛经济改革。【原文：The World Bank will unlock further financing for Kenya on condition that the East African economy implements wide-ranging economic reforms agreed on last year, according to the lender.】

item.title: 土耳其金融科技公司 Sipay 在新一轮融资中估值 8.75 亿美元
item.description: 土耳其金融科技公司 Sipay 在 Elephant VC 领投的 B 轮融资中筹集了 7 800 万美元，使其估值超过 8.75 亿美元。【原文：Turkish fintech company Sipay raised $78 million in a Series B funding round led by Elephant VC, pushing its valuation above $875 million.】
